mainText: The user PHNX has created an amazing website called Hynews, it covers only the best (satirical) Hytale news! Go check them out by clicking on this post.
We compiled some of the Hytale community's videos about Hytale being saved. You can view them by clicking on this post.
The Hytale.com website is back,the socials are back up, and Simon has officially saved Hytale, Thank you Simon.
Add the hytale tracker to your RSS reader by clicking on this post
This is your one-stop shop for all Hytale news, learn more about us on the about page.
